rows.label: qev010401_MSG0001
rows.name: What am I going to do? This can't be all the parts...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Er, y-yes! Hello! Welcome! Have a seat right here!
I mean, um, if you want to...sit down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0003
rows.name:
No espresso or lattes today, I'm afraid.
We're, uh...sold out. Yes! That's it! So sad...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0010
rows.name: Compromise

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree to drink whatever she can offer.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0020
rows.name: Complain

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0021
rows.name: Demand to know why there's no espresso.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh, w-wow! You're being really nice about this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0005
rows.name:
But no. I mean, you took the time to come here and
whatnot, so you deserve to drink what you really want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Well, aren't you one nosy customer?
Must reeeally need your caffeine fix, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0007
rows.name: But yeah, I kinda can't make them today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0008
rows.name: Hey, um, are you good with machines by any chance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0009
rows.name:
You certainly SEEM good with machines!
Just, you know...aura-wise? So...maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Jo that you can sling a mean wrench if need be.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0041
rows.name: Admit you're probably better at breaking stuff.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0010
rows.name: I knew it! Sometimes you can just tell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Really? Well, um, I'm sure you're still better at repairing
stuff than me, right? I mean, you kind of have to be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm a complete basket case when it comes to
mechanical stuff. Well, and most other stuff, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Anyway, the owner just got this new espresso machine,
and it seems that I've somehow managed to...break it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0014
rows.name:
It should be okay once I get the right parts,
but finding them has been a nightmare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Er, I don't suppose you might know where I could find
three heatproof inox pipes, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0016
rows.name: Oh, gosh! I'm so glad I asked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0017
rows.name:
As soon as that machine is up and running, I'll fix
you the tastiest latte you've ever had! I mean it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0018
rows.name:
My boss begged for WEEKS to get this espresso
machine made for the shop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0019
rows.name:
As soon as it's fixed, I'll make you the best latte ever,
I swear. So, um, PLEASE can you go find me those
heatproof inox pipes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0020
rows.name:
My boss was asking why the espresso machine isn't
around. I told her it called in sick, and then she just
kind of looked at me funny and walked away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0021
rows.name: If this thing doesn't get fixed soon, I'm so dead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0050
rows.name: Assure

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Jo not to worry as you have the pipes she needs.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0060
rows.name: Chide

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0061
rows.name: Reprimand Jo for lying to her boss.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0022
rows.name:
Really?! Wow, you're so dependable!
Unlike that machine. ...Or me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0023
rows.name:
Can I see? Er, please?
I'm kinda sorta freaking out about this here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0024
rows.name:
It took forever to get this thing in, and I broke it
before it made a single cup! YOU try telling your
boss something like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0025
rows.name:
So, um...any luck? I don't suppose you've found those
heatproof inox pipes yet, have you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0026
rows.name: That's perfect, thank you! Really![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Now we can start offering espresso again!
...Or for the first time, depending on how you
look at it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0028
rows.name: Oh, right! Hold on just ONE second! I'll be right back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0029
rows.name: I'm going to fix you the best thank-you latte EVER![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0070
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0071
rows.name: Enthusiastically accept Jo's offer.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0080
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0081
rows.name: Politely decline Jo's offer.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0030
rows.name: Aw, you're so sweet. Believe me, it's my pleasure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0031
rows.name:
Honestly, it just feels nice to be able to give someone
what they want. Seems like most BLADEs prefer a stiff
drink over a good cup of joe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0032
rows.name:
But I'm going to pull out all the stops and make this the
finest coffee creation of my career![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0033
rows.name:
What? No, you have to let me do this for you! I need
practice before making one for real custom— Er...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0034
rows.name:
I mean, ha! Ha ha! Don't mind me! Just be a minute.
...Please have a drink before you go?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0035
rows.name:
Oh, I know! It's been hot lately, so why don't we make
it an iced latte?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0036
rows.name:
You hold on to your seat, now! I may be useless with
machines, but I'm one mean bean slinger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0037
rows.name: Eeep! Aaaaaack! NOOOOOOOOOOOO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0038
rows.name: Huh? Jo, wait! Where are you going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0090
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Coco what happened to Jo.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0100
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Coco to tell you about herself.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0039
rows.name:
Beats me. She went into the back, screamed,
then ran off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0040
rows.name:
If I had to bet, I'd say she broke some kitchen
equipment. ...Again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0041
rows.name:
That girl is death to electronics. The register, customers'
comm devices, you name it. She even managed to
short-circuit a light bulb once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0042
rows.name:
Frankly, nothing that breaks around her surprises me
anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0043
rows.name: Me? Oh, I own the place. Nice to meet you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0044
rows.name:
Unlike the muddy slop other places give you,
we use only the purest springwater for our coffee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0045
rows.name:
We even grow our own beans on actual plants.
No synthetics here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0046
rows.name:
This café is the one place in my life where I make no
compromises. Well, when Jo's not tearing it down,
anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Are you a friend of hers? Would you mind checking on
her and seeing if she's okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0048
rows.name:
I can't leave the shop, and I really need her back here
as soon as possible. Thanks a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0049
rows.name:
Holy frother, I have sinned. It's been three days since
my last contraption... Augh, why do I have to wreck
EVERYTHING I touch?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0050
rows.name: Ack, sorry, I... Oh. It's you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0051
rows.name: I'm so sorry! Your iced latte...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0052
rows.name:
I was trying to get the ice when the stupid freezer...
I mean, when stupid ME broke it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0110
rows.name: Boggle

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Jo how someone can even break a freezer.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0120
rows.name: Console

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0121
rows.name: Console Jo by telling her we've all broken freezers.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0053
rows.name: I don't know what I did...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0054
rows.name:
Maybe I have mutant powers and give off
electromagnetic waves or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0055
rows.name:
That would explain why the espresso machine and the
freezer both died the moment I got near them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0056
rows.name: Curse you, machine gods! Why have you forsaken me?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0057
rows.name:
...R-really? You too? Gosh, you must be a real menace
around Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0058
rows.name:
B-but I'm glad to hear I'm not alone. Maybe the two of
us destroyers need to go make some sort of offering to
the machine gods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0059
rows.name: Huh? My boss needs me back at the shop?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0060
rows.name: But I CAN'T go back! Not after all this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0061
rows.name:
Maybe if I had a couple of L-002 fuel tanks to repair
the freezer... But now? I just can't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0062
rows.name:
I feel TERRIBLE asking, but can you help me out again?
You're the only one I can turn to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0063
rows.name:
I'll be here making supplications to the machine gods
till you get back with those L-002 fuel tanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0064
rows.name: Maybe if I beg enough, they'll lift this curse...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0065
rows.name:
All I ever wanted was to make people a nice hot drink
and bring five minutes of peace to their day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0066
rows.name: I, um, just got a call from my boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0067
rows.name:
Coco's got to be pretty mad, right? Am I fired?
Super fired? I'm probably super fired, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0130
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0131
rows.name: Nod and tell Jo she's probably super fired.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0140
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0141
rows.name: Reassure Jo that everything will be just fine.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0068
rows.name:
Oh, I know you're right. But I still want to work there!
Nowhere else on Mira takes that kind of care with their
coffee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0069
rows.name:
Plus, I just love the café! Well, the parts of it I don't
manage to break, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0070
rows.name:
You really think so? I mean, I guess I've burned through
a dozen coffee makers and still kept my job, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0071
rows.name:
In any case, I need to go apologize.
Oh! Did you happen to find those L-002 fuel tanks
for me, by any chance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0072
rows.name:
Okay! Then it's time to woman up and give the boss
a call![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0073
rows.name: Phew... You can do this, Jo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0074
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0075
rows.name: ...Wait, what? Why won't this thing turn on?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0076
rows.name:
Oh, you have GOT to be kidding me!
I broke my COMM DEVICE?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0077
rows.name: It's like a bad dream...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0150
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0151
rows.name: Offer Jo use of your own device instead.

rows.label: qev010401_JNK0160
rows.name: Watch

rows.label: qev010401_SEL0161
rows.name: Keep your own device far, far away from this girl.

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0078
rows.name: What? No, I couldn't. I'd just break yours, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0079
rows.name: That's it! I'm never touching another machine again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0080
rows.name: I can tell what you're thinking, and believe me, I agree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0081
rows.name: It's true. I ruin everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0082
rows.name:
Ha! Classic Jo... Your mechanical troubles are proof
of the divine at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0083
rows.name: M-ma'am?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0084
rows.name: I don't remember giving you a lunch break this long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0085
rows.name:
Look, you really think blowing up a freezer or two is
going to faze me at this point?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0086
rows.name:
I want the best of everything for my coffee. Including
the best coffee maker: Jo, the ballista barista![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0087
rows.name:
I don't know what to say... *sniff* How are you two
years younger than me and yet so much more mature?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0088
rows.name:
Heh. Looks like Jo put you through the wringer as well.
Here—this is from me. Please take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0089
rows.name: Now c'mon, Jo! You and me have a freezer to fix.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0090
rows.name: ...Yes, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0091
rows.name:
Er, and next time—that is, if you're not TOTALLY sick
of me—next time, I swear, I'll make you that latte![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010401_MSG0092
rows.name: So I hope to see you again soon at the Sunshine Café![ST:wait ]
